sentences.en: A spell of poor health took the edge off her performance.
sentences.cn: 一度身体欠佳令她表现有失水准。

sentences.en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentences.en: Diet and relaxation are two important keys to good health.
sentences.cn: 限制饮食和放松身心是保持健康的两个要诀。

sentences.en: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.cn: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

sentences.en: Exercising the body does a great deal to improve one's health.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体对增进健康大有益处。

sentences.en: For years we have argued that the health service is underfunded.
sentences.cn: 多年来我们一直都在说卫生医疗方面资金投入不足。

sentences.en: Health officials have successfully confined the epidemic to the Tabatinga area.
sentences.cn: 卫生官员成功地将疫情控制在塔巴廷加地区。

sentences.en: His moodiness may have been caused by his poor health.
sentences.cn: 他的喜怒无常可能是身体欠佳所致。

sentences.en: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.cn: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.en: It was a time when people weren't so hung-up about health.
sentences.cn: 那时人们不太关注健康。

sentences.en: Polyunsaturated oils are essential for health. Excess is harmful, however.
sentences.cn: 多不饱和油对健康很重要。但是，食用过量就会有害。

sentences.en: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
sentences.cn: 伦道夫的著作专门论述污染对健康的影响。

sentences.en: Steps taken now to maximise your health will pay dividends later on.
sentences.cn: 现在采取措施增强体质会使你日后受益。

sentences.en: The health authorities now know how to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 卫生部门现在知道如何对付这种病了。

sentences.en: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
sentences.cn: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

sentences.en: The service covers contraceptive advice and health checks, and is available free.
sentences.cn: 服务项目包括避孕建议和健康检查，并且免费提供。

sentences.en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentences.cn: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。

words.tran_cn: 健康的；有益健康的；卫生的
健康的，健全的；有益于健康的
医疗保健；健康护理，健康服务；卫生保健

phrases.tran_cn: 社区卫生（健康）；公共卫生；社会健康
卫生安全；安全保健部门；健康与安全部门
n. 国民医疗服务制度
n. 公共卫生；公共卫生设施

trans.tran_en: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are
